statements: DELETE FROM TeleoncologyMeetings WHERE meeting_type = 'Follow-up' AND participants LIKE '%Dr. Smith%';
DELETE FROM TeleoncologyMeetings WHERE scheduled_date = '2023-05-15' AND meeting_type = 'Follow-up';
DELETE FROM TeleoncologyMeetings WHERE location = 'Hospital A' AND scheduled_time > '15:00:00' AND agenda LIKE '%progress%';
DELETE FROM teleoncology_teams WHERE team_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM consultations WHERE patient_id = 100 AND team_id = (SELECT meeting_id FROM multidisciplinary_meetings WHERE meeting_date = '2023-08-15');
DELETE FROM meetings WHERE team_id = 2 AND meeting_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE patient_age >= 65 AND patient_diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%';
